Detailed Description

Generic data structure used for all lwIP network interfaces.

The following fields should be filled in by the initialization function for the device driver: hwaddr_len, hwaddr[], mtu, flags

Field Documentation

u8_t netif::flags

flags (

See Also
Flags)

Referenced by netif_add(), netif_input(), netif_remove(), netif_set_down(), netif_set_link_down(), netif_set_link_up(), netif_set_up(), and tcpip_input().

u8_t netif::hwaddr[NETIF_MAX_HWADDR_LEN]

link level hardware address of this interface

u8_t netif::hwaddr_len

number of bytes used in hwaddr

netif_input_fn netif::input

This function is called by the network device driver to pass a packet up the TCP/IP stack.

Referenced by netif_add(), and slipif_init().

netif_linkoutput_fn netif::linkoutput

This function is called by ethernet_output() when it wants to send a packet on the interface.

This function outputs the pbuf as-is on the link medium.

u16_t netif::mtu

maximum transfer unit (in bytes)

Referenced by netif_add(), and slipif_init().

char netif::name[2]

descriptive abbreviation

Referenced by netif_add(), netif_find(), netif_index_to_name(), netif_set_default(), and slipif_init().

struct netif* netif::next

pointer to next in linked list

Referenced by netif_add(), and netif_remove().

u8_t netif::num

number of this interface.

Used for Interface Identification API and NETIF related, as well as for IPv6 zones

Referenced by netif_add(), and netif_find().

void* netif::state

This field can be set by the device driver and could point to state information for the device.

Referenced by netif_add(), slipif_init(), and slipif_poll().
